mapper.insert: insert into user (username, password, firstName, lastName, email, phone, status) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firstName = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastName = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, firstName, lastName, email, phone, status from user
